_comment: Sample job posting for testing - Updated to match new schema
title: Machine Learning Engineer
other_benefits: Health insurance, Annual air ticket, Performance bonus
visa_requirement: Valid work visa required or visa will be provided
job_description: We are hiring an ML Engineer to build candidate ranking systems for logistics recruitment.
desired_candidate_profile: Hands-on ML engineer with strong Python and API skills.
recruiter_instructions: Prioritize candidates with NLP experience. Schedule interviews within 5 days.
custom_questions: Do you have experience with transformer models?
